repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: UNITE, the Union of Needle Trades, Industrial, and Textile Employees was formed in 1995 after a merger between the International Ladies' Garment Workers Union (ILGWU) and the Amalgamated Clothing and Textile Workers Union (ACTWU).
In 2004 they announced they would merge with the Hotel Employees and Restaurant Employees Union (HERE) which created UNITE HERE.
Jay Mazur served as president of UNITE from its beginning until his retirement in 2001. Bruce Raynor was elected president at that time and served until the HERE merger.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This is a collection of over twenty-five hundred photographs and over one hundred slides and several audio CD's. Pictures showing the history of UNITE, ACTWU, Labor Leaders, strikes, protests, boycotts, immigration and various types of labor actions.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: UNITE Photographs #6000/044 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 6000 AV: UNITE Audio-Visual Collection 6000 G: UNITE Posters 6000 MB: UNITE Memorabilia 6000 P: UNITE Photographs 6000 PUBS: UNITE Publications 6000/012 P: UNITE Northeast Department Photographs 6000/016 P: UNITE Local 169 Amalgamated Northeast Regional Joint Board Photographs 6000/018 P: UNITE Pacific Northwest District Council Photographs 6000/020 P: UNITE Research Department Photographs 6000/024 P: UNITE Local 23-25 Photographs 6000/033 P: UNITE Local 155 Photographs 6000/037 P: UNITE Communications Department Photographs 6000/043 P: UNITE Editor Photographs 6000/049 P: UNITE Local 9 Photographs 6000/050 P: UNITE Local 10 and Local 23-25 Photographs
